per-part-payment-desc: I pay my share of the booking. My partners will also be able to pay their share by accessing their account. The rest of the payment will be done on the spot.
instalment-payment-desc: I pay a deposit to validate my booking. The rest of the payment will be made on the spot at the time of the booking.
on-the-spot-payment-desc: Payment for the booking must be made on site at the time of booking.
deposit-payment-desc: A deposit is made on my credit card to validate my reservation. No amount is deducted. The blocked amount may be deducted in case of late cancellation.
per-participant-by-deposit-payment-desc: If my participation is not confirmed, no amount will be debited from my credit card and the wallet / token will be refunded.
